WorkItem.Description:
Hello Guys, hi EvanM,
 
I recognized that a trigger for trinkets with effects which pulls you under 35% health is added to Rawr. For the tanktrinkets in the ProtWarrior Model this effects are not added to the trinkets. Especially the Symbiotic Worm and I think the Bedrock Talisman would be very interesting at this point.
 
Is it possible for you to add this effects with the new trigger to the items?
 
And let me say:
Thank you very much for all the hard work which you spend for this model.
 
Additional Information:
Used Rawr Version: Rawr 4.0.19 Beta
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Missing trinket effects with the <35% player HP trigger

Comments.Message: The <35% trigger was added for trinkets where the *target* is <35% health, not the player. The player will need some other flag since that's a different thing.

Ah sorry. Then I missunderstood this trigger thing ;-) I'm sorry.
But is there any possibility to design such a trigger for player <35% health? I think this would be only possible with a couple of assumptions (but this is the same situation with the other trigger i think)
Trinkets modelled, all tank models except TankDK now use these trinkets properly
